item.title: Report I-2025010023
item.description:
Report I-2025010023

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-13T06:18:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-11
  • City: DETROIT
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PVS CHEMICAL SOLUTIONS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Tank was not in driver's sight. Site representative was watching the tank and notified driver to stop offloading once approximately 50 gallons of Sodium Bisulfite overflowed into containment. The site suspected the gaging system was not functioning. No Injuries/Exposure.

item.title: Report X-2025020231
item.description:
Report X-2025020231

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-31
  • City: PONTIAC
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE CONTAINED 4 1.9L CONTAINERS OF 3M BATHROOM DISINFECTANT CLEANER CONCENTRATE. EACH CONTAINER WAS INDIVIDUALLY BOXED WITHIN SHIPPING PACKAGE. 2 SEALS FAILED ON THE LIDS OF CONTAINERS CAUSING THEM TO LEAK OUT ONTO CARDBOARD PACKAGING
